name: Vesilind's Crux Quiz
description:
It is said that a sorcerer's entire history is written the first time she casts a spell. I am inclined to disagree. I think that one's fate is as mutable as one's own heart—fixed, unyielding for some; yet for others, as unpredictable and hard to control as a flood.

Welcome to the Crux. 

The Vesilind's Crux Quiz is a companion piece to the game DOORS. In it, you're asked a set of questions that will suggest to you the best of the four Houses for your unique disposition.

Will it be Sophia-Bas, house of power and information gathering;  Diadēma,  house of control and orderliness; perhaps, Keyaki, house of utility and harmony; or lastly, Ballast, house of preparedness and functional systems?

Take the quiz and find out, then try the demo for DOORS! 

Lemme know if anything's broken!

-Ben
